firefly.server.quitAllFireflyServers

firefly.server.quitAllFireflyServers(pid=None)[source]

Quit python processes associated with hosting Flask web-servers.

Parameters

pid (int, optional) – process id to kill, defaults to None, quitting all processes

Returns

return_code

Return type

int
